forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Transparent Bright Material & Face View command

comments.text: Hi! In version 146.1 (you're on [version]), we added the following. Thx everyone & enjoy!
There's a new command to have something always face your local view (e.g. VR eyes, or desktop camera): "... then all parts face view"!
There's a new material, a mix between "Inner glow" and the "Cut out" one! Ctrl+V'ing a Steam image has the shape cut where it's transparent + be lit even in shade.
If you want you can use both of above for a technique called "billboarding", where the flat quad shape is textured with something like a grass image, for instance.
(note "face view" creates a different view/ thing rotation for each different person in the area... pls handle with care :))

thread.latestCommentText: (careful, "face view" creates a different thing rotation for each different person in the area.)
